title: What is this beautiful font ?
content:
Hello everybody.

First of all, thanks for this forum and the community. It is very useful.

I research what is this font ?  
I join 4 pictures. I have others pictures if necessary.

Look at the letter "a", I love it. And the letter "t".

But I don't know what is this font ?

I would like to use it for a website.

Best regards.  
Eric

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [index3.png](http://web.archive.org/web/20131017075046/http:/typophile.com/files/index3.png) | 1.3 KB |
| [index2.png](http://web.archive.org/web/20131017075046/http:/typophile.com/files/index2.png) | 1.74 KB |
| [index.png](http://web.archive.org/web/20131017075046/http:/typophile.com/files/index_0.png) | 1.58 KB |
| [Sans-titre-7.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20131017075046/http:/typophile.com/files/Sans-titre-7.jpg) | 12.81 KB |
author: Eric font man

comments.content:
Thanks !!! congratulations ! It's the true.

I do not know how to find ?? What is your secret to find it ?

Me, I use WhatTheFont of Myfonts but the application don't find it.

Thanks.

This one was easy to me, I worked on DocVadis project some years ago and I remember headlines and main logo were set in Sansumi.  
For the rest, I don't use WTF anymore but still post on WTF forum. WTF is not accurate at all to me. The tools I'm using now are [WhatFontiS](http://web.archive.org/web/20131017075046/http:/www.whatfontis.com/), [Bowfin Printworks' lists and fonts identification guides](http://web.archive.org/web/20131017075046/http:/bowfinprintworks.com/TheLists.html), [Identifont](http://web.archive.org/web/20131017075046/http:/www.identifont.com/), Chrome's code inspector and [Chengyin Liu Chrome App WhatFont](http://web.archive.org/web/20131017075046/http:/chengyinliu.com/whatfont.html).
